faq.question: How long is the Microblading Hair Stroke Technique Seminar?
faq.answer: The Microblading Hair Stroke Technique Seminar is 3 Days course starting every week on Monday through Wednesday and the class start from 10 am to 6 pm.
faq.heading: headingOne

faq.question: Will I be certified once the seminar is completed?
faq.answer: Each student will receive a Certificate of Completion from Outstanding Training Center.
faq.heading: headingTwo

faq.question: How much is the Licensing Fee to be certified by the State of NY? How Long does it take to receive the actual license from the State of NY?
faq.answer: The Licensing fee for NY State is $126, which includes all the fees and application for the NY States Tattoo License from the NY States Health Department.
faq.heading: headingThree

faq.question: What’s included in the Microblading Seminar?
faq.answer: During the Microblading Seminar, we will go over different kinds of eyebrow tattoos, what are some of the trending methods and traditional techniques.  We will go over consultation, design, color blending, color corrections and various techniques and health department requirements for licensing.  During the 3 Days seminar, we will train some one with no experience or litle experience into a certified Microblading Hair Stroke Technique practitioner.
faq.heading: headingFour

faq.question: How’s the seminar structured? Who are the instructors?
faq.answer: We pride ourselves in providing a intimate learning experiences with no more than 10 students for each seminar.  And each of our instructors has over 10 years of Permanent Makeup Experiences.
faq.heading: headingFive

faq.question: What’s included in the $1800 Seminar Fee?
faq.answer: The $1800 Seminar fees includes, all the materials, equipments, and teaching materials for the entire 3 Days Seminar and also a $1,600 Professional Microblading Kit which can service up than 30 clients.
faq.heading: headingSix

faq.question: Does Outstanding Training Center offers advanced training seminar?
faq.answer: Yes, beside the basic Microblading Hair Stroke Technique, we us offer one day seminar on various other permanent makeup such as Lips, Eyeliner, Powdered Looks, Aeoeral Repigmentation and Hairline rejuvenation.
faq.heading: headingSeven

faq.question: I have prior Eyebrow Microblading experiences, can I still attend the Microblading Seminar?  And will the fee be the same?
faq.answer: Our Microblading Seminar is designed for both entry level with no prior experiences or practitioners with prior experience who just wants some advanced Microblading training.
faq.heading: headingEight

faq.question: Will the live model be provided for my own practices?
faq.answer: Each students are encouraged to bring their own model during the live model portion of the seminar and if not we have synthetic skins for eah students to practice on as well.
faq.heading: headingNine

faq.question: Do you sell products for the Permanent Makeup procedures?
faq.answer: Yes, each of the students will be able to purchase products directly through us and each students will receive 20% OFF all products and future seminars.
faq.heading: headingTen

faq.question: How can I purchase products for the Permanent Makeup procedures?
faq.answer: We can be reach at 646-902-1678 / 917-383-3368 or email us at outstandingtrainingcenter@gmail.com.  When calling us please provide the member service team your main contact phone number you provided to us when you first attened any of our training seminars, that is your account phone number.  Only our members can purchase products from Outstanding Training Center.
faq.heading: headingEleven

faq.question: Can I purchase products from Outstanding Training Center without being a member?
faq.answer: No, we only wholesale products to member students who have been trained by the Outstanding Training Center, to ensure each members have the proper training in using our professional products for the permanent makeup services.
faq.heading: headingTwelve

faq.question: Can a member client order products through online portals?
faq.answer: We are in the process of developing a online portal for all our members to purchase product directly, until the portal is completed, in the mean time please call or email us to place an order with Outstanding Training Center.
faq.heading: headingThirteen

seminars.title: Hair Strokes
seminars.description: The Hair Strokes Technique is often considered a type of permanent makeup, however, its concept is different: the ink is deposited with manual pen with blade which is 2 times thinner than average human hair and that allows technicians to draw crisp, thin and natural looking hairs.

seminars.model: Live Model Demonstration and Hands on Model Training
seminars.model_details: On the last day of the 3 Days Training, there will be live demonstration of the Microblading Technique by our experienced instructor and in the afternoon each students will get an opportunity to demonstrate what they learn through live models (each students needs to bring their own model).
seminars.starter_kit_details: Each student will receive a premimum starter kits including: various colors, microblading pen & needles, various support proucts such as anesthetic and retail products.
seminars.benefits_details: After attending any of our seminar, each students will be able to purchase products directly through us and receive 20% OFF all purchases and any future seminars.

seminars.title: Powdered
seminars.description: The Powdered fill method involves the application of thousands of tiny little dots of pigment, inserted into the skin, gradually building up a colour and a defined shape. Hair Strokes method can be done on top of the Powered method for definitions.

seminars.title: Lips
seminars.description: The Lip tattoos are designed to define lips, not to create volume or puffiness, it will give you the appearance of a full lip. Pigmentations can be inserted to obtain more natural lip color or more vibrant colors, retouch time frame varies depend on the desired colors.

seminars.title: Eyeliners
seminars.description: Permanent eyeliner is placed in the lash line, which enhances and defines the beauty of the eyes. The technique is a very natural look and will make lashes appear thicker when not wearing mascara. It opens the eyes and makes them pop.

seminars.title: Areola
seminars.description: The Areola repigmentation is an advanced procedure corrects the color, size and shape of the nipple. This procedures can use pigments and tints to create an illusion of nipple protrusion with a realistic areola on a breast mound without surgery.
